user.title: Carroll Electric Account
user.description:
Enter your Carroll Electric account details.

Your account number must be provided instead of a username as the usage API requires it as an input.

The URL of a Selenium server is required to automate interactions with the Carroll Electric website.

Configuration of this integration may take several seconds or even minutes.

abort.already_configured: This Carroll Electric account is already integrated.

error.invalid_account_number: Account Number must be digits of the form: XXXXXX-XXX
error.invalid_selenium_url: Selenium server URL is not a valid URL
error.selenium_server_unreachable: Selenium server did not respond at this URL. Check the URL is correct and the service is running.
error.selenium_server_bad_host: Connection response was recieved, but does not appear to be from a Selenium server. Check the URL and relevant network configuration.
error.selenium_server_busy: Timed out while waiting for a Selenium session. Check the service has not reached the max-sessions limit.
error.login_failed: Login to carrollecc.com was unsuccessful. Check account number and password.
